created.description: Fixes name not found errors by adding missing imports and declarations
Fixes module not found errors by installing missing dependencies and updating import paths
Fixes type assignability errors by adding type assertions and guards
Fixes property not found errors by adding optional chaining and type assertions
Fixes null/undefined check errors by adding optional chaining and nullish coalescing
